rejection.details:
At the moment your petion would read: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to disablity living alounce. 

If you submit another petition on this subject your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
